children.title: Applied Mathematics and Computer Science
children.description: I always wanted to get my master's degree someday. Well when I had the opportunity, I accepted it. Because I just started it, I can't tell much about it. Currently I am working on my own MVC framework in PHP. This project is all based on creating a good architecture. It is mostly based on plug and play technology.

children.title: Computer Engineering
children.description: University was the time I really started to improve my skills. I finished many project while I was studying. These project were security, real-time, web and desktop based applications. I also participated in security competitions CTFs. My graduation project was based on using data mining in search engines to make them intelligent. I also had lots of experiences by doing internship and part-time job in different companies.

children.title: Information Technology
children.description: High school was a life changer for me. It was then that I got into programming. I participated in many international and national competitions and collected many medal, awards and certificates. I also started web programming with PHP here. I also participated in many social events. Leadership week is one of these social events, in which our teachers select some of us to lead the school and I was selected to be vice principle and computer teacher. I also played table tennis, basketball and volleyball.
